data.Sentence_cn: 我在幼年的时候，曾多次乘飞机旅行。
data.Sentence: I used to travel by air a great deal when I was a boy.

data.Sentence_cn: 我的父母曾经住在南美洲，所以假期里我常从欧洲乘飞机到他们那里。
data.Sentence: My parents used to live in South America and I used to fly there from Europe in the holidays.

data.Sentence_cn: 我总是由一位空中乘务员照管，从未遇到过不愉快的经历。
data.Sentence: A flight attendant would take charge of me and I never had an unpleasant experience.

data.Sentence_cn: 我习惯了乘飞机旅行，只是有一次把我吓坏了。
data.Sentence: I am used to travelling by air and only on one occasion have I ever felt frightened.

data.Sentence_cn: 起飞之后，我们在城市上空低低地飞行，然后慢慢爬高。
data.Sentence: After taking off, we were flying low over the city and slowly gaining height,

data.Sentence_cn: 这时飞机突然调转头来，飞回了机场。
data.Sentence: when the plane suddenly turned round and flew back to the airport.
While we were waiting to land,

data.Sentence_cn: 一位空中乘务员告诉我们要保持镇静，待飞机一着陆，就马上不声不响地离开飞机。
data.Sentence: a flight attendant told us to keep calm and to get off the plane quietly as soon as it had touched down.

data.Sentence_cn: 飞机上的人都很着急，大家都急于想知道究竟出了什么事。
data.Sentence: Everybody on board was worried and we were curious to find out what had happened.

data.Sentence_cn: 后来我们才得知，飞机上坐了一位非常重要的人物。
data.Sentence: Later we learnt that there was a very important person on board.

data.Sentence_cn: 有人报告警察，说飞机上安放了一枚炸弹。
data.Sentence: The police had been told that a bomb had been planted on the plane.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们降落之后，飞机被彻底搜查了一遍。
data.Sentence: After we had landed, the plane was searched thoroughly.

data.Sentence_cn: 幸运的是，什么也没有找到。5个小时后，我们又起飞了。
data.Sentence: Fortunately, nothing was found and five hours later we were able to take off again.
